meanings.sent1: My mom is in her final trimester of pregnancy.
meanings.sent2: The first trimester of the year is from January to March.
meanings.sent3: During the last trimester, the baby kicks a lot!
meanings.sent4: The trimester of winter seemed to drag on endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of the last trimester builds as the due date approaches.

meanings.definition: One of the three divisions of the academic year.
meanings.sent1: The fall trimester starts in September.
meanings.sent2: Students enjoy the break between each trimester.
meanings.sent3: In the middle trimester, exams can be challenging.
meanings.sent4: The final trimester is always the busiest with projects and assignments.
meanings.sent5: Each trimester brings new subjects and opportunities to learn.
